ai-tha-ap165:0.3_0: Hearing a guide and a senior by monks.
ai-tha-ap165:1.4_0: If he picks up a borrow.
ai-tha-ap165:2.1_0: That’s how I gave the Buddha
ai-tha-ap165:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap165:3.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
ai-tha-ap165:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap165:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Khaṇḍaka.
ai-tha-ap165:7.1_0: Also, in diported by senior monks, and by grief for the third part of the senior monks.
